// Test Case 1
--- Input
3
10 3 5
100 9 9
100 1 2

--- Output
3 2
3 2
50 0

----------------------------------

// Test Case 2
--- Input
5
1000000000 3 5
123456789 77 12
978653412 201 100
1029384756 111 98
1729739850 555 13

--- Output
266666667 133333334
1469723 10154454
4820233 9737845
9179107 10409297
2876906 132817169

----------------------------------

// Test Case 3
--- Input
5
9999 9 11
8888 12 5
7777 1 2
3333 33 30
12123445 988 123

--- Output
1010 808
592 1629
3889 0
98 108
12171 98465
